choiceInfo.label: Stream
choiceInfo.summary: Communication over the vSockets STREAM protocol

choiceInfo.label: Any direction
choiceInfo.summary: Communication in any direction (guest-to-host or host-to-guest)

choiceInfo.label: Virtual mode
choiceInfo.summary: Virtual mode - Disk modes are respected

choiceInfo.label: Physical
choiceInfo.summary: Physical mode - Commands are passed through to the LUN

choiceInfo.label: Persistent memory disk backing option
choiceInfo.summary: Backing a virtual disk using persistent memory

choiceInfo.label: strong
choiceInfo.summary: Cache data consistency is guaranteed after a crash

choiceInfo.label: write_thru
choiceInfo.summary: Writes to the cache cause writes to the underlying storage
